sentences.en: He was content to bide his time patiently, waiting for the opportunity to approach her.
sentences.cn: 他情愿耐心守候，以等到接近她的时机。

sentences.en: Bide thy time in patience; it will not be for long.
sentences.cn: 你要耐心等候，不会太久的。

sentences.en: Bide your time until June to strike with major plans and events.
sentences.cn: 等到六月份才开展你的大型计划或者事件。
